eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.Model
      • eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers.Classifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AODE, GaussianDiscriminantAnalysis, HODE, LatentClassificationModel, NaiveBayesClassifier, TAN

    public abstract class Classifier
extends Model
    The Classifier abstract class is defined for Bayesian classification models.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Variable classVar
      class variable
      protected InferenceAlgorithm inferenceAlgoPredict
      Represents the inference algorithm.

      • Fields inherited from class eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.Model

        atts, dag, errorMessage, initialized, learningAlgorithm, learningAlgorithmFlink, plateuStructure, vars, windowSize

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Classifier(Attributes attributes)
      Constructor of a classifier which is initialized with the default arguments: the last variable in attributes is the class variable and importance sampling is the inference algorithm for making the predictions.

    • Field Detail

      • inferenceAlgoPredict

        protected InferenceAlgorithm inferenceAlgoPredict
        Represents the inference algorithm.

      • classVar

        protected Variable classVar
        class variable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Classifier

        protected Classifier(Attributes attributes)
              throws WrongConfigurationException
        Constructor of a classifier which is initialized with the default arguments: the last variable in attributes is the class variable and importance sampling is the inference algorithm for making the predictions.
        Parameters:
        attributes - list of attributes of the classifier (i.e. its variables)
        Throws:
        WrongConfigurationException - is thrown when the attributes passed are not suitable for such classifier

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        public Multinomial predict(DataInstance instance)
        Predicts the class membership probabilities for a given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to be classified. The value associated to the class variable must be a missing value (i.e. a NaN)
        Returns:
        the posterior probability of the class variable

      • getClassVar

        public Variable getClassVar()
        Method to obtain the class variable
        Returns:
        object of the type Variable indicating which is the class variable

      • setClassVar

        public void setClassVar(Variable classVar)
                 throws WrongConfigurationException
        Method to set the class variable. Note that it should be multinomial
        Parameters:
        classVar - object of the type Variable indicating which is the class variable
        Throws:
        WrongConfigurationException - is thrown when the variable is not a multinomial.

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName(String className)
                  throws WrongConfigurationException
        Method to set the class variable. Note that it should be multinomial
        Parameters:
        className - String with the name of the class variable
        Throws:
        WrongConfigurationException - is thrown when the variable is not a multinomial.

      • getInferenceAlgoPredict

        public InferenceAlgorithm getInferenceAlgoPredict()
        Method to obtain the inference algorithm used for making the predictions. By default, importance sampling is used.
        Returns:
        an object of the class InferenceAlgorithm

      • setInferenceAlgoPredict

        public void setInferenceAlgoPredict(InferenceAlgorithm inferenceAlgoPredict)
        Method to set the inference algorithm used for making the predictions. By default, importance sampling is used.
        Parameters:
        inferenceAlgoPredict, - object of the class InferenceAlgorithm
